column4: just saw a screenshot of vista - I'm impressed by the sidebar! Is there any way to get this "rss-reader" sidebar. or  a skin for the gdesklets-clock? Here the screenshot: http://scr3.golem.de/?d=0602/Windows_Vista&a=45506&s=6
and the rss-reader is really cool i have to admit
take a look at gdesklets, lovely and open source :P
